original_text: And the Levites that are gone away far from me, when Israel went astray, which went astray away from me after their idols; they shall even bear their iniquity.
korean_text: 이스라엘 족속이 그릇 행하여 나를 떠날 때에 레위 사람도 그릇 행하여 그 우상을 따라 나를 멀리 떠났으니 그 죄악을 담당하리라

sentences.original_text: And Levites that are gone away far from me
which went astray away from me after their idols
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 우상을 따라 나에게서 길을 잃은 자들

sentences.original_text: they shall even bear their iniquity
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 죄악을 짊어져야 할 것이다
